definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: I. I. [[נחל]] (√ of foll.; cf. Ar. nah.ala give for one's own, bestow, so Sab. [[נחל]] Sab. Denkm:No. 9. i. 10; No. 15, i. 4; cf. pp. 41, 65; hence [[נַחֲלָה]] orig. gift, as Sab. [[נחלת]] Levy-Os:ZMG xix (1865), 284 Sab. Denkm:l.c.; Min. id., Hom:Südar. Chrest. 128).
